text: "Dream Lover" is a 1958 song written by Bobby Darin and was released as a single by Atco Records. It went to number 2 in the United States and number 5 in both Norway and Canada. It went on be covered by Dion DiMucci, Ricky Nelson, Billy "Crash" Craddock and Tanya Tucker featuring Glen Campbell. ==References== Category:1959 songs Category:Doo-wop songs Category:Pop songs Category:Country songs Category:Bobby Darin songs Category:Billy "Crash" Craddock songs Category:Dion DiMucci songs Category:Ricky Nelson songs Category:Tanya Tucker songs Category:Glen Campbell songs
title: Dream Lover
